channel.title: Comments on: Visualizing Code Metrics with NDepend

item.title: By: Computing the Overview Pyramid metrics with NDepend - Simple Oriented Architecture

item.description: […] for .Net projects. The good news is that it can be done with NDepend. Querying the code base and defining custom code metrics are two powerful features of NDepend. With these tools at your disposal, writing CQLinq queries to […]
